scripts.clean: docker compose -f compose/handler.dev.yml down --remove-orphans; docker compose -f compose/employer.dev.yml down --remove-orphans; docker compose -f compose.benefit.yml down --remove-orphans; docker rm -f $(docker ps -a -q); docker volume rm $(docker volume ls -q);
scripts.employer:linux: cross-env COMPOSE_HTTP_TIMEOUT=200 UID=$(id -u) GID=$(id -g) docker compose -f compose/employer.dev.yml -f compose/linux.yml
scripts.handler:linux: cross-env COMPOSE_HTTP_TIMEOUT=200 UID=$(id -u) GID=$(id -g) docker compose -f compose/handler.dev.yml -f compose/linux.yml
scripts.youth:linux: cross-env COMPOSE_HTTP_TIMEOUT=200 UID=$(id -u) GID=$(id -g) docker compose -f compose/handler.dev.yml -f compose/linux.yml
scripts.benefit:rebuild: yarn clean; rm -rf frontend/benefit/applicant/.next; yarn benefit build --no-cache; yarn benefit:up
scripts.employer:rebuild: yarn clean; rm -rf frontend/kesaseteli/employer/.next;yarn employer build --no-cache; yarn employer:up
scripts.handler:rebuild: yarn clean; rm -rf frontend/kesaseteli/*/.next; yarn handler build --no-cache; yarn handler:up
scripts.youth:rebuild: yarn clean; rm -rf frontend/kesaseteli/youth/.next; yarn youth build --no-cache; yarn youth:up
